name: Pokémon Dragon Ball Z Team Training
overview: About: Dragon Ball Z Team Training is a Pokémon Fire Red mod that makes your game all the Dragon Ball epicness you could ever want. Basically, if you wanted to have a pet Goku to fight your enemies with in Pokémon, this is all of that and more. There are currently 180 Dragon Ball "fighters" (Pokémon) in the game, and the locations reflect places in the DB world. Features: • There are 170 attacks including 130 new attacks (techniques from DBZ) and 30 old attacks (from Pokémon, like Headbutt for example) • New animations • New maps for some cities • Changed some overworld sprites -Many items were added. (capsules, senzu beans...etc
